name: Vegan Chicken Nuggets
description: You're gonna love these vegan chicken nuggets made with chickpeas and a crispy cornflakes crust! They're super easy to make, pretty healthy, and SOOO delicious. Vegan comfort food at its best!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon mustard ((yellow mustard like Dijon or French's mustard) )

recipeInstructions.text: Start by preparing the crust: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Crumble the cornflakes with your hands in small pieces. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the panko bread crumbs and cornflakes on top. Bake for about 2 minutes until golden-brown. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Start by preparing the crust: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Crumble the cornflakes with your hands in small pieces. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the panko bread crumbs and cornflakes on top. Bake for about 2 minutes until golden-brown. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Set aside. Then place the oats into your food processor or blender and process into a fine flour. Add the rest of the ingredients (including the cooked onion) and pulse until you get a crumbly mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Set aside. Then place the oats into your food processor or blender and process into a fine flour. Add the rest of the ingredients (including the cooked onion) and pulse until you get a crumbly mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the chickpea mixture into 14 equal portions and form each portion into a nugget.  Coat with some almond milk and roll in the baked panko bread crumbs and cornflakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide the chickpea mixture into 14 equal portions and form each portion into a nugget.  Coat with some almond milk and roll in the baked panko bread crumbs and cornflakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place on a new sheet of parchment paper and bake for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place on a new sheet of parchment paper and bake for 15 minutes.

keywords: how do you make vegan chicken nuggets, recipe for vegan chicken nuggets, vegan chicken nuggets
